org.xchain.framework.jxpath

Class ScopedQNameVariablesImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.jxpath.QNameVariablesImpl

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.apache.commons.jxpath.Variables, QNameVariables, ScopedQNameVariables

    public class ScopedQNameVariablesImpl
extends QNameVariablesImpl
implements ScopedQNameVariables

    Christian Trimble, Devon Tackett

    • Method Detail

      • declareVariable

        public void declareVariable(java.lang.String qName,
                   java.lang.Object value)
        Description copied from class: QNameVariablesImpl
        Declares a variable for the specified name and value. If the variable name is of the form 'prefix:local-name', then the prefix is resolved. If the variable name is of the form '{uri}local-name', then the uri is taken from the variable name. Otherwise, the entire variable name is considered a local name and the uri is the null namespace uri.
        Specified by:
        declareVariable in interface org.apache.commons.jxpath.Variables
        Overrides:
        declareVariable in class QNameVariablesImpl
        Parameters:
        qName - the name of the variable with the format 'prefix:local-name', '{uri}local-name', or 'local-name'.
        value - the value to be set for this variable.

      • declareVariable

        public void declareVariable(javax.xml.namespace.QName varName,

        Description copied from class: QNameVariablesImpl
        Declares a variable for the specified qName and value.
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        value - the value of the variable being declared or replaced.

      • declareVariable

        public void declareVariable(java.lang.String varName,
                   java.lang.Object value,
                   Scope scope)
        Description copied from interface: ScopedQNameVariables
        Declares a variable for the specified name and value. If the variable name is of the form 'prefix:local-name', then the prefix is resolved. If the variable name is of the form '{uri}local-name', then the uri is taken from the variable name. Otherwise, the entire variable name is considered a local name and the uri is the null namespace uri.
        Specified by:
        declareVariable in interface ScopedQNameVariables
        Parameters:
        varName - The name of the variable with the format 'prefix:local-name', '{uri}local-name', or 'local-name'.
        value - The value to be set for this variable.
        scope - The scope of the variable.

                         Scope scope)

        Parameters:

        scope - The scope to search on.
